channel.title: ::yell command [delta]
channel.description: ok its like this i want when a person yell i want its be like [administator][insane]: hey and i want different ranks like have different colors how can i add that?

item.title: ::yell command [delta]
item.dc:creator: @xparty-hatszx xparty-hatszx
item.description:
@xparty-hatszx wrote:

delta does not support colors. HOWEVER. i can slap a chunk of code together for you

Edit:::::::GOT IT!!!

here it is

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “[Insane owner]”;
}
yell(titles + “[” + playerName + "]: "

  • command.substring(5));
    }[/code] ^DIRECTLY OUT OF MY SOURCE!!! (not the ‘[insane owner]’ thing… i edited that… but everything else = DIRECTLY OUT OF SOURCE)^

EDIT #2: proof by me

Read full topic
